Name: Amalia (Michael Rousseau)
Ingredients: 50 ml Bacardi Carta Blanca Superior White Rum
Instructions: Cut kiwi fruit in half and use a spoon to scoop flesh from one half into shaker. MUDDLE kiwi fruit in base of shaker, add next 4 ingredients (all but ginger ale) and SHAKE with 50/50 crushed and cubed ice. Fine strain into chilled glass. Carefully pour ginger ale into drink over the back of a spoon.
History: Mexican Bacardí Legacy 2013 winning cocktail created by Michael Rousseau at Four Seasons in Mexico City, Mexico.
